name: Untitled Amogus Game
description:
My second video game!

You are a brave little crewmate who's battling against the impostor, who kidnapped your girlfriend, orange, and imprisoned her in his dungeon.

Parkour your way into the dungeon, fight enemies, collect their souls and coins!

Use your resources to progress and retrieve the love of your life! 💞

(This was a 4fun project made in two weeks so don't expect much :D)
